title: Ask HN: Cheapest/easiest way to host a static site?
author: offtop5
story_text: This is more of a thought experiment, I know a multitude of ways to do this which require loads of setup, jumping through AWS hoops, etc. I'd like ideally way to deploy to a hosted service with a single command. Imagine Heroku but even easier.
